data.title: Eclectic, excellent food and servic
data.text: If you have a few extra bucks to spend (this place ain't cheap) but want really good food go here.  The food and service were stellar.

data.title: A great place for sushi and meeting up with friends. Some nights have Karaoke.
data.text: At Kontiki Wine and Raw Bar, the sushi is tasty, the beer is cold, the wine is very good. It can be loud with music and conversation so not the best place for a quiet intimate get away. More of an upbeat lively local Wellington hangout. Some nights have a DJ so there may be some spontaneous dancing and Karaoke.

data.title: Great for locals
data.text: Fun eclectic atmosphere. Combo international food with Asian flare. Great bar and drinks. Most people come for the sushi but I dont eat that. Big menu to choose from.

data.title: Birthday celebration!
data.text: Awesome place to celebrate a birthday party.  Although, some disappointed. I made a reservation for  25-30 people, but only two tables for 21 people were set aside.  Most of my guests (27) arrived, but wasn't a place to seat, some left, another have to seat in the bar.  Atmosphere is great, maybe that's the reason of why two tables were reserved when I was told that we will have three.  Food is good you name and they have it.  DJ is the best in town, but needs more room to dance.

data.title: horrible service
data.text:
Food was good...the service was indifferent at best...and the polo crowd was so pretentious and obnoxious I could not wait to get out of there. It was packed with loud, drunk, "look at me" name droppers...if this is your scene, have at it.

Won't be back in this lifetime.

user_location.name: West Palm Beach, Florida, United States

data.title: Fantastic Eclectic Array of Dishes!
data.text:
From the moment you walk into Kontiki you know that this place is special. The art deco lights, the tables, chairs, couches and wall art let you know that this is going to be fun.
The drinks are great and the specials are well though out and delivered in high fashion style. The service is excellent and the wait staff is at your beckoned call through out the night.
Each entree is a work of art as it is delivered to the table and done exactly as it should be. I had the Osso Buca a number of times and it is fall off the bone great. The fish dishes are fabulous and our friends had the Sushi and didn't stop raving about the quality.
Can't wait to go back and fight the crowds this season. Enjoy!

data.title: Lunch
data.text: This place is amazing. All types of food available. We had chicken wings that tasted amazing, pizza was great real cheese, pasta, tuna salad and squid. Such a variety but everything we had was delicious.  And don't forget the Freud cheese cake for desert.

data.title: Asian Fusion at it's best!!
data.text: We eat here at least once a month. I highly recommend the Sea Bass Tataki, tuna tower and pad thai. Great ambience and service.

data.title: Very versatile menu
data.text: Great food. Same owners as Tub Tim Thai. The menu has quite a few options so anyone liking any kind of food, not just Asian or Thai, can find something to eat here. Good sushi as well.

data.title: Great food and entertainment
data.text: This is a great restaurant.  The Sushi is always good and the drinks are made perfect!  Try the oatmeal pie for dessert if they have it.

data.title: Consistency Rules
data.text: How many times have you found a great restaurant only to go back and have a change of quality,or  meal prepared differently by a change of staff, or drink not up  to par with the one you first had, not at Kontiki. The menu and  employees are there to make your time with them the best it can be. The range of flavors goes from a burger with yummy french fries to a rack of lamb with the tastiest spinach and mashed potatoes. I have never raved about spinach anywhere else. The pizza is so different with the highest caliber of cheeses and the sushi is the freshest  ever. Hold on to your plate so it won't swim away. If you want to change the combinations of any dish, it will be adjusted to your desires. What a place  and I have been there with friends, grandchildren, other family members and yes my dog. We sit outside under cover from weather. She is treated like royalty with her own water dish and sides of chicken. The hours vary with the season so check the web site.You must try everything on the menu at least once!!!!

data.title: Always great
data.text: Lots of menu choices, friendly staff, yummy food, nice interior, great spot for people watching. Probably the best sushi in Wellington

data.title: Disappointed/overpriced
data.text:
We took a table outside because we thought it was very loud inside. I guess it was Friday evening.
They have sushi, Thai and also American style dishes.
I thought a lot of items were totally overpriced, especially taking into account the location of the restaurant ( a strip mall plaza next to publix), the decor of the restaurant, the ambience (it was more of bar scene), and the quality of the food (good, but not amazing).
I can see going back to socialize or have a drink w some friends, but definitely not an upscale restaurant, as its prices suggest.

data.title: Happy hour
data.text: It is a shame.  Had a meal with my husband on Saturday night.  Service was very good.  Came back on a Tuesday @4 pm because website advertised happy hour.  Well when the bill arrived no happy hour prices.  Charging $13.00 per drink.  5 drinks plus 2 appetizers $97.00.  Upon asking to what happen to the happy hour I was informed that that was only on house wine and house alcohol. But that menu was never shown or disclosed .That is considered in my opinion false advertising.  I don't believe I will be visiting this establishment in the future. There aren't too many good restaurants in the Palm Beach area to put up with fraudulent advertising.

data.title: LITTLE FOR EVERYONE
data.text: FOOD IS GOOD, Has something for everyone,Steaks, osso bucco, sushi, and thai.  Always pleasant atmosphere.

data.title: Family dinner
data.text: They have the best sushi in town the service is great and fast, the style of the place is very eclectic. I recommend it.

data.title: Not too bad but overpriced like many Wellington places.
data.text:
Kontiki’s

I tried to give it 3 stars, but as always my rating is based on value: price/quality of food/service.
And while the food is okay, with some good dishes and some others a bit weak, while the service can be pretty attentive or not (depends on the night), the prices are definitely too high to justify what you get. 

Now, before I mislead someone, if you are Wellington resident you will probably go here and be fine with that. If you are visiting instead you might want to aware of their prices for tapas and small dishes.
Wellington is an affluent town, and a lot of residents have no problem spending money. They like to stay local, which is fine, but that also allows a lot of business owners to have high prices that rarely are in sync with quality/service. 

Wellington doesn’t have bad restaurants, you just often feel (unless you live there at the Polo or some other big money community so you don’t care) you overpaid.

Funny how Kontiki’s actually is very fair with its wine prices per bottles, but anything else….just overpriced. Sushi was hit and miss, and we tried a few of their specialties: they were okay, some tastier than others, but again, it just feels overpriced.

data.title: Date Night
data.text: Been here many times. The food is normally good with a few exceptions.  The menu is vast ... I've tried most of it. Pricing is available in all ranges.

data.title: Nice Atmosphere and Polo Favorite
data.text: Wellington Equestrians make Kontiki their hang out.  The Thai food is very good and pricey.  The bar is large and offers a nice variety of choices.  The atmosphere is fun and quirky.

data.title: Awesome Food, Great Atmosphere
data.text: This sushi fusion raw bar restaurant has a little of everything, so picky eaters should be happy as should those with more varied palates.  Appetizers/Entrees were very well prepared and very tasty; desserts were average. Prices were on the high side but worth it. It was very busy with everyone from the horse shows, so there was a lot of great energy. The ambiance is horse-oriented but also very hip. Would definitely go again.
